faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services
faq.q1.question: How quickly can you help me?
faq.q1.answer: We typically respond within 30 minutes during business hours. For urgent issues, we offer emergency support with faster response times.
faq.q2.question: Is remote support safe?
faq.q2.answer: Yes, absolutely. We use enterprise-grade encryption and secure connection protocols. You maintain full control and can end the session at any time.
faq.q3.question: Do you offer on-site visits?
faq.q3.answer: Yes, we provide on-site service throughout Moldova for hardware installation, complex setup, and issues that cannot be resolved remotely.
faq.q4.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.q4.answer: We accept cash, bank transfers, and major credit cards. Payment is due after service completion and your satisfaction.
